definition: variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Then, he borrowed the idea of a seven-day week and leap year from the Hebrew calendar.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他借用了希伯来历法中一周七天和闰年的概念。

sentences.english: Now we have Ashton Kutcher speaking out, citing the Mayan Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 如今我们有艾什顿库奇站进去发言，援用玛雅历法。

sentences.english: His book, "Ancient and Modern Book of General calendar" is the History of China's first calendar.
sentences.chinese: 他写的《古今历法通考》，是我国第一部历学史。

sentences.english: In revising the calendar, Zhang attached huge importance to practice.
sentences.chinese: 在历法修订过程中，张遂非常重视实践。

sentences.english: The Vedic calendar is based on cosmic cycles, or Yugas.
sentences.chinese: 吠陀历法是建立在宇宙周期，或者说是年代之上。

sentences.english: The Suipian offered new evidence for study calendar of Chu state.
sentences.chinese: 《日书》“岁篇”为楚国历法研究提供了新证据。

sentences.english: Pope Gregory XIII mandated a reform to the calendar; his Gregorian calendar approximated the mean tropical year as 365.2425 days.
sentences.chinese: 罗马教皇格里高利十三世授权改革历法。

sentences.english: Not only our country so, east neighbour South Korea also implement these two kinds of calendars.
sentences.chinese: 不只本人国如此，东邻韩国也同时实行这两种历法。

sentences.english: The first achievement is the "Taichu Calendar" that he made.
sentences.chinese: 第一，就是他编制的历法《太初历》。

sentences.english: Legends say that the Emperor Huangdi invented the calendar in 2637 BC.
sentences.chinese: 传说黄帝在公元前2637年发明了这套历法。

sentences.english: Gerardo wanted to know if their calendars were all using the same count.
sentences.chinese: 杰勒德想知道他们的历法是否使用相同的计算方法。

sentences.english: The Tmperial Board of Astronomy was a research institution on astronomy and calendar in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清代钦天监是专门研究天文历法的重要机构。

sentences.english: The lunar calendar is different from the calendar used in the west.
sentences.chinese: 农历和西方所用的历法不一样。

sentences.english: The ancient references recorded that the two suggestions for the calendar existed in the Emperor Yao time.
sentences.chinese: 古代文献记载帝尧时的历法存在两种不同说法。

sentences.english: The calendar is based on the size and rotation of the planet Coruscant .
sentences.chinese: 该历法的根据是科洛桑行星的大小和运转速度。

sentences.english: This calendar represents 13 forces and 20 energies.
sentences.chinese: 这种历法代表13种力量和20种能量。

definition: "quarter remainder" calendar, the first calculated Chinese calendar, dating from c. 484 BC
the 5th century Chinese calendar established by Zu Chongzhi 祖沖之|祖冲之
aspect of the celestial bodies (used for navigation and astrology)
sun, moon and the five visible planets
intercalary month in the lunar calendar/leap month
Zhou Bi Suan Jing, or Chou Pei Suan Ching, one of the oldest Chinese texts on astronomy and mathematics
old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
